metadata.description: 1.solution with monitoring - this will deploy core digital signage solution & monitoring components. 2. solution without monitoring - this will deploy core digital signage solution
specify the costing model
specify the region for webapps and azure sqlserver desaster recovary it should be different of resource group region
specify the region for application insights
Name of the IoT Hub instance to provision.
Number of desired IoT Hub units. Restricted to 1 unit for F1. Can be set up to maximum number allowed for subscription.
The admin user of the SQL Server
The password of the admin user of the SQL Server
The name of SQL database
Describes plan's instance count
Describes Web Site name which should be unique
Describes Web Site name which should be unique for recovery app
Describes the node server name which should be unique
Describes API Server name which should be unique
Subscription ID of your Azure AD tenant
Tenant ID of Azure AD
Describes B2C Tenant Name Directory
Describes the client Id registered with B2C Directory
if you select costing model 4 specify client id describes the client Id registered with B2C Directory the disaster recovery webapplication
Describes the B2C Sign Up-Sign In policy
Describes the B2C redirect URL for the Native Client
if you select costing model 4 specify b2cNativeRedirectURL describes the B2C redirect URL for the Native Client of disaster recovery web application
Client ID of Azure AD application
Secret Key of Azure AD application
if you select costing model 4 specify the read region of the cosmos database account the region should be different of the resource group region
specify the region for oms workspace, if you have selected solution type as without monitoring this is optional
specify the region for oms automation account, if you have selected solution type as without monitoring this is optional
specify the oms retention period in days, if you have selected solution type as without monitoring this is optional
specify the traffic routing method for traffic manager
